title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Generative AI-Enabled Experiential Learning and Authenticity in University Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more science experiment scenarios using generative AI
Learners can analyze experimental data and draft reports using GenAI tools
Learners can evaluate the ethical use of AI principles in experiential learning processes by applying three or more levels of implementation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
